str2: Immediately, soon, at once. Adverb from euthus; directly, i.e. At once or soon.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A little girl, a young girl; a girl, maiden. Neuter of a presumed derivative of kore; a girl.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To raise up, set up; I rise from among (the) dead; I arise, appear. From ana and histemi; to stand up.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From peri and pateo; to tread all around, i.e. Walk at large; figuratively, to live, deport oneself, follow.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
Twelve; the usual way in which the Twelve apostles of Jesus are referred to. From duo and deka; two and ten, i.e. A dozen.
A year. Apparently a primary word; a year.
Immediately, soon, at once. Adverb from euthus; directly, i.e. At once or soon.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From ek and histemi; to put out of wits, i.e. Astound, or become astounded, insane.
From existemi; a displacement of the mind, i.e. Bewilderment, 'ecstasy'.
